summary: In 1944, a German colonel loads a train with French art treasures to send to Germany. The Resistance must stop it without damaging the cargo.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Paul Scofield|Jeanne Moreau|Suzanne Flon|Michel Simon|Wolfgang Preiss|Albert Rémy|Charles Millot|Richard Münch|Jacques Marin|Paul Bonifas|Jean Bouchaud|Donald O'Brien|Jean-Pierre Zola|Arthur Brauss|Jean-Claude Bercq|Howard Vernon|Louis Falavigna|Richard Bailey|Christian Fuin|Helmo Kindermann|Roger Lumont|Gérard Buhr|Christian Rémy|Victor Beaumont|Jacques Blot|Michel Charrel|Nick Dimitri|Bernard Fresson|Max Fromm|Bernard Lajarrige|Jean-Jacques Leconte|Daniel Lecourtois|Wolfgang Sauer
title: El tren
